channel.title: 2007 Welcome Screen
channel.description: hi how can i add the old 2006-2007 welcome screen to my rsps its 2006 pi based

item.title: 2007 Welcome Screen
item.dc:creator: @Team_Rocket Team_Rocket
item.description:
@Team_Rocket wrote:

Are you referring to the small box with a Rune in each corner? Or the full-screen? The full-screen can be made to display properly even though it doesnâ€™t by default. Either way here is the 289 Welcome Interface in-case anyone needs it (small box):

         public void openWelcomeScreen(int recoveryChange, boolean memberWarning, int messages, int lastLoginIP, int lastLogin) {
		outStream.createFrame(176);
		outStream.writeByteC(recoveryChange);
		outStream.writeWordA(messages);			
		outStream.writeByte(memberWarning ? 1 : 0);
		outStream.writeDWord_v2(lastLoginIP);	
		outStream.writeWord(lastLogin);		
	}

Read full topic
